### Update dependencies

Automatically created PR from [`ci/dependency-updates`](https://github.com/CasperWA/gh-actions/tree/ci/dependency-updates).

For more information see the ["CI - Update dependencies PR" workflow](https://github.com/CasperWA/gh-actions/blob/main/.github/workflows/_local_ci_update_dependencies.yml).

#### To-do

- [ ] Check that the diff is sensible, and that tests and builds pass with the new dependency versions.
- [ ] Make sure that the PR is **squash** merged, with a sensible commit message.
